## How was this book made?

This book is created using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), "An open-source scientific and technical publishing system".
The files used to generate the web book you're looking at are housed on GitHub and are automatically rendered and deployed as this website!
If you'd like to contribute and edit this book, a simple option is to click the "Edit This Page" button on any page of this book.
More detailed instructions on how to contribute are in the [Appendix](#contributing).
